level.text: Each notary public, before obtaining his or her commission, and for each renewal of his or her commission, shall pay to the District of Columbia Treasurer a license fee of seventy-five ($ 75).
Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 5052 (June 11, 2010); as amended by Fiscal Year 2011 Budget
Support Act of 2010, effective September 24, 2010 (D.C. Law 18-223), published at 57 DCR 6242,

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 43 DCR 3365 (June 30, 1995); as amended by Final
